web_snippets: In a delightful twist, Rosemary Ravinal, the world's premier bilingual speaking coach, media trainer, and former VP of Public Relations for ...
The Speakipedia Podcast welcomes bilingual TEDx speaker and executive presentation coach, Rosemary Ravinal.
Rosemary Ravinal, 66, is a consummate public relations pro with 3 decades of bilingual, bicultural communications expertise.
